name: encounter_drone/stay
description:
The drone stops its descent and hovers in front of you. A speaker begins to play a prerecorded message:

"Please stand still, citizen. Non-compliance will have consequences. We are investigating suspicious behaviour in this area. Please answer any question truthfully. Are you currently engaging in any illegal behaviour?"

"No."

"Are you aware of any illegal behaviour happening right now in this area?"

"No."

"Please present your ID."
